about.title: About
about.subtitle: About Listali
about.description: Listali is a smart system for managing collaborative shopping lists. We enable families and groups to manage their shopping together efficiently and conveniently.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make collaborative shopping management simple, efficient, and enjoyable. We believe that every family and group needs better tools to coordinate shopping and manage shared lists.

groups.title: Group Management
groups.description: Create groups with family and friends, invite new members, and manage access permissions.

lists.title: Smart Lists
lists.description: Create and edit shopping lists with recommended products, prices, and shopping tracking.

realtime.title: Real-time Updates
realtime.description: Get instant updates on changes to shopping lists and active shopping sessions by group members.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Your data is protected and encrypted. We are committed to protecting user privacy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Listali Terms of Service
terms.description: The following terms of service define the rules and guidelines for using the Listali platform.
terms.introduction: Welcome to Listali. By accessing and using our platform, you agree to the following terms of service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account or using our service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not agree to any of these terms, you may not use the service.

use.title: Use of Service
use.content: You may use our service only for lawful purposes. You agree not to use the service:

rules.1: In any way that violates any local, national, or international law or regulation
rules.2: To transmit or send harmful, viral, or malicious content
rules.3: To attempt unauthorized access to systems or other accounts
rules.4: For any purpose that infringes upon the intellectual property rights of others

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and password. You agree to be responsible for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: Your use of our service is subject to our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. By using the service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, features, and functionality of the service, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software code, are the property of Listali or its content providers and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: The service is provided 'as is' without any express or implied warranties. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. We will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to update or modify these terms of service at any time. Changes will take effect immediately upon posting on the website. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms of service, please contact us at: support@listali.com
